message: Looks like Pro3 is up.  Any takers on coding ... 3...2...1...OK I got it...just kidding...lets discuss a plan.
Is this room live...am I in the wrong place...@OmarRamos  @TonyPotter @ChandraSapkota
@all This is the correct place for Project 03 ;-)
From some of the comments on Piazza it sounds like there may not be a whole bunch of coding for this first deliverable but hopefully we can figure out a way to break things out evenly
Is the Project 3 description available now too? I don't think it was up earlier when I had checked in the morning
alright, looks like it is posted here: https://www.udacity.com/wiki/ud494/project3?nocache

From what I'm seeing in the link above it looks like we should be able to break up the tasks a bit and work in relay fashion (so that each of us can write a portion that fulfills some of the test cases until we have them all passing). I'll try and review the test cases in a little more detail later tonight to see if I can help figure out a logical breakdown for the 4 of us and share that here to discuss (if somebody gets to it before I do and cares to share their thoughts, feel free ;-)).
